vulnerabilities.explanation: Unsafe system command execution detected via os.system(). An attacker could potentially execute arbitrary code on the host machine.
vulnerabilities.secure_fix: Avoid os.system; use subprocess.run with validated inputs and shell=False.

vulnerabilities.explanation: Hardcoded credentials detected in the codebase (e.g., password == "..."). This explicitly exposes sensitive information.
vulnerabilities.secure_fix: Use environment variables (os.getenv) or a secure secrets manager.
